chart_description: The system.io_full_pressure chart represents the fullness of the I/O queue in percentage over time, indicating the level of pressure on the storage devices.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: The percentage of time the I/O queue is at full pressure (100% utilization) for a period of 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: The percentage of time the I/O queue is at full pressure (100% utilization) for a period of 300 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: The percentage of time the I/O queue is at full pressure (100% utilization) for a period of 60 seconds.
